column1: @realDonaldTrump #USMCA isn’t the only trade victory. Since taking office @realDonaldTrump implemented new deals with South Korea & Japan. He also forced China to the negotiating table & signed a deal to open Chinese markets to a variety of American products including Wyo beef & energy exports.

Pres. @realDonaldTrump ran on a promise to put America first with respect to our trade policy. Today we made good on that promise when the Senate passed #USMCA. Twelve million American jobs depend on trade with our North American neighbors. https://t.co/vLRweKH0W5 https://t.co/9FURGkR1OR

We are fortunate to have @RepLizCheney serving the people of Wyoming in the U.S. House. Liz Cheney’s strong leadership and commitment to advancing Wyoming values are vitally important in our efforts to bring fundamental change to the House of Representatives.

It’s time for the Democrats to stop wasting the American people’s time on #impeachment. Congress needs to focus on the issues that Americans care about including highway infrastructure lowering the cost of prescription drugs and securing our border. https://t.co/wkI72bBjdA

With @EPWGOP approving #USMCA today we’re one step closer to final passage in the Senate. This important trade deal means more jobs & economic growth. It also means more certainty & stability for our job-creators. And it means more opportunity & prosperity for American families. https://t.co/vrInmURXdt
We’ll continue working with @realDonaldTrump to reduce the cost of prescriptions and expand affordable health care choices.

Democrats are pushing a one-size-fits-all government-run health care system fueled by higher taxes. Republicans are focused on protecting people with pre-existing conditions and lowering the cost of care.

Our bipartisan legislation will establish a special task force to combat the spread of chronic wasting disease. The bill will keep America’s wildlife healthy while allowing rural communities to thrive.
Last night the Senate passed important bipartisan legislation to protect our wildlife. The ACE Act will help states and tribes partner with Washington on conservation efforts. https://t.co/3qDD0K11wW

.@POTUS has set a goal of completing environmental reviews for construction projects within two years. This proposal establishes that standard. These regulatory updates promote safety and still protect America’s air water and communities. #NEPA
The Trump administration is taking common sense steps to make the National Environmental Policy Act work better for the American people. https://t.co/1V255l77QH  #NEPA

Tonight Iran attacked U.S. forces in Iraq. My prayers remain with our service members in the region and their families. Our priority continues to be their safety. There is no doubt the U.S. will appropriately respond once we have a full assessment of what happened tonight.
With the death of Iran’s General Soleimani the American people and people around the world are much safer. https://t.co/XzXieS9jXX

The Speaker of the House really has no role or leverage in impeachment in the Senate. We have the 51 votes necessary to move forward using the Clinton model for impeachment. It’s time for @SpeakerPelosi to get on with it or get out of the way. https://t.co/SLQ7Je7Pzg

Former Gov. Dave Freudenthal joined his family friends and the people of Wyoming at the unveiling of his official portrait today. What a terrific celebration of the character and accomplishments of our 31st Governor. https://t.co/wGQ3TRjVHX

After 22 years in the Wyoming Legislature Tony Ross continues his commitment to public service as the newly sworn-in Senior Municipal Court Judge in Cheyenne. He will bring justice truth and civility to this distinguished position. https://t.co/ouIMVdDGII

Soleimani was responsible for hundreds of American deaths and he would have killed more. Thank you to our brave service members and intelligence professionals who put their lives on the line every day to protect our freedoms.

Our military and intelligence community stand on the front lines to defend America. Yesterday U.S. forces removed Iranian General Qassem Soleimani. His 20-year span of terror is over. His days of killing Americans are over.
Bobbi and I wish you all a Happy New Year! https://t.co/WHLMujZALA
Bobbi and I wish you a very Merry Christmas! https://t.co/xpN0TXqraD

75 years ago thousands of American soldiers including my father were fighting for our freedom in the #BattleoftheBulge. As we celebrate Christmas please remember their sacrifice and the sacrifice of all of our brave armed service members and their families. https://t.co/Z58B4C4O25
@FoxNews @GovInslee It’s time to reform the Clean Water Act to stop these governors from weaponizing the law against America’s people economy & environment.
Wrote in @FoxNews about how @GovInslee is hurting the environment and playing into the hands of Russian President Vladimir Putin. https://t.co/Ci6vLuaJL2

@realDonaldTrump Senate Republicans are ready to proceed to trial. We will then get back to work and focus on policy issues important to the American people. These include lowering health care costs securing our borders fixing roads and bridges and growing the economy.

Democrats have been obsessed with impeaching @realDonaldTrump since day one. Tonight they cast one of the most divisive votes in American history. This political and partisan impeachment is rapidly losing public support. https://t.co/MpmNZmwF0c

Obamacare has failed to live up to its promises. This ruling highlights the need to modernize and personalize health care for every American. Republicans are focused on protecting people with pre-existing conditions and lowering the cost of care.

The Fifth Circuit finally ruled what we all knew: #Obamacare’s individual mandate is unconstitutional. Now it will be up to the district court to find what parts of the law can survive. https://t.co/uXNtJ2bxag

It was a privilege to join veterans at the 75th anniversary ceremonies for the #BattleoftheBulge. The soldiers who fought in this battle saved the free world. Every soldier was a hero & has a story to tell. My father was one of those heroes. https://t.co/zMntNoQnmN

NDAA also imposes sanctions on those involved in installing Russia’s #NordStream2 pipeline. President Putin uses Russia’s natural gas to extort & threaten our allies. These sanctions will help stop this pipeline & eliminate Russia’s geopolitical weapon. https://t.co/fdLjLWGeCF

The Senate just passed the National Defense Authorization Act. This bill gives our troops the pay raise they have earned & deserve & includes funding for important military projects at F.E. Warren Air Force Base in Cheyenne. #NDAA https://t.co/pxPovTxkHG

It was a honor to attend the 75th anniversary ceremony for the #BattleoftheBulge in Belgium. We honor the heroic efforts of Allied Forces we remember those who served & we remember those who made the ultimate sacrifice in defense of our freedom. https://t.co/g0H2lrt88Q https://t.co/4itCyh8d9z
@SenatorCarper In Wyoming we have elk mule deer bison and so many more amazing species. We must continue to protect them.

Joined @SenatorCarper in introducing bipartisan legislation that will help Washington partner with state & tribal leaders to conserve and manage wildlife. The bill establishes a task force to address the growing problem of chronic wasting disease. https://t.co/nlsMbUQuUr

@SenCapito @Sen_JoeManchin WY has dominated domestic coal production for decades. We’re always looking for new ways to use this vital resource. This bill will encourage investment & create new jobs in WY & across the country. https://t.co/rjzeuwlEK9

Today @SenCapito @Sen_JoeManchin & I introduced the bipartisan COAL TeCC Act to advance research & promote coal-derived carbon products (water filters automobile bodies bikes building products etc.) through a program within DOE. https://t.co/TJ1ovD6yll

Joined @SenatorEnzi & @RepLizCheney in addressing the WY Stock Growers today via Skype for their winter meeting in Casper. We were fortunate to have a special guest with us Vice Pres. Dick Cheney. A big thanks to @WY_StockGrowers for all you do for our rural & Ag communities. https://t.co/16UJXjaVvf

Spoke on the Senate floor today in honor of the 150th anniversary of WY women’s suffrage. WY played an important role in advancing women’s equality in the rest of the U.S. We all owe a huge debt of gratitude to WY’s extraordinary women leaders of the past & the present. https://t.co/YuivWCIyL8

WY was the 44th state to enter the Union but the 1st state when it comes to women’s equality. WY refused to enter the Union without equal voting rights for women. Today we pause to remember where it all started 150 years ago: the trailblazing state of WY the Equality State. https://t.co/Z8PM7loa9a

Congrats and good luck to this year’s #TeamWyoming as they compete in the @LasVegasNFR. Proud to be here with @GovernorGordon First Lady Jennie Gordon & @CodyStampede board to cheer them on. #NationalFinalsRodeo #NFR https://t.co/bvhQB6k0Qh

It was an absolute privilege to travel to Afghanistan with President @realDonaldTrump on Thanksgiving and thank our @WyoGuard members in person for their service to our country. All of Wyoming can be proud of the incredible job they’re doing. https://t.co/GVQy7vgR2k
Congratulations to Georgia’s newest U.S. senator @SenatorLoeffler. I look forward to working with you to Keep America Great.

@realDonaldTrump @wyoguard I was incredibly proud to introduce Pres. @realDonaldTrump to @WyoGuard members. They’re part of the largest overseas deployment of WY soldiers in a decade and are doing an outstanding job. https://t.co/5JCKthKDra https://t.co/dfgsBMkQW1

On a day to reflect on what we as Americans are thankful for it was an honor to travel to Afghanistan with Pres. @realDonaldTrump to tell our soldiers in person how truly grateful we all are for their sacrifice and dedication. #Thanksgiving https://t.co/5YC7nyFOCC
Bobbi and I hope you all have a wonderful Thanksgiving. https://t.co/A9zmmWb7mL

@TheJusticeDept By improving data collection and increasing coordination among law enforcement agencies families across Indian Country have a better chance of bringing their loved ones safely home. https://t.co/I7xUKi44Xr

Murder rape kidnapping domestic violence & human trafficking affect women & children in tribal communities at astonishing & unacceptable levels. I applaud AG Barr & @TheJusticeDept for taking action today to address these horrific problems. https://t.co/0c3JRuJTzL

@SenKevinCramer If we’re serious about reducing carbon emissions in a meaningful way we need to get serious about dealing with nuclear waste. Nuclear power is America’s largest source of carbon-free energy but it leaves leftover spent fuel.

Introduced legislation with @SenKevinCramer that will advance the safety review of the Yucca Mountain facility. It also takes important steps to strengthen the nation’s nuclear waste management program. https://t.co/wiGRmsVZ0E
Thank you @GovernorGordon for testifying today and giving the Senate Wyoming's perspective on this important issue. https://t.co/ENX0OBZoBH

The Central WY Hospice held a special flagpole dedication today at the Kloefkorn Hospice Home. It was an honor to attend with my father-in-law WWII and Korean War veteran Bob Brown. Thanks for honoring our veterans as you provide care and comfort to them and their families. https://t.co/os1g2fTVH4

The Wyoming Farm Bureau is celebrating 100 years of working hard for the agriculture community of Wyoming. It was great to join them in Laramie today to celebrate this incredible milestone. Looking forward to the continued growth leadership and advocacy of the @wyfarmbureau. https://t.co/pk7SktxTsI

@seanhannity @senatemajldr @SenJohnThune @RoyBlunt @SenJoniErnst @SenToddYoung Addressed this on @FoxNews last week. Senators and @RealDonaldTrump’s team must be able to question the whistleblower in person. https://t.co/NCFsZ2bTGp
@GovernorGordon We need reform. I look forward to @GovernorGordon’s testimony and working with him to improve and strengthen Section 401 of the Clean Water Act.

Glad that @GovernorGordon is coming to Washington next week to testify on how the Clean Water Act is being hijacked by a number of states. Washington state is blocking Wyoming coal from being exported around the world. https://t.co/P0VeCAeQxp

@FoxNews @WorldBank Two years ago the @WorldBank stopped supporting energy projects that help developing countries escape poverty. These restrictions need to be lifted for these countries to have access to affordable reliable electricity to support economic growth.
Wrote in @FoxNews online about why the @WorldBank must support critical coal oil & gas projects that help people in developing countries escape poverty. https://t.co/sxMrWvhYRg

There is no better place to be than in Wyoming on #VeteransDay. We had a great turnout at the veterans breakfast in Douglas and the American Legion ceremony in Cheyenne. Across every town in Wyoming we thank all who have served and their families. We owe them everything. https://t.co/2Xb4nGjPJp
Today and every day we honor those who have risked their lives to protect us. Thank you to all who have served. #VeteransDay https://t.co/3FNdxVJsEu

Senate Republicans have delivered a record number of conservative judges who will serve our nation for decades to come. https://t.co/v2iofro4TB

Republicans are committed to bringing down health care costs & protecting people with pre-existing conditions. We won’t let Democrats’ hypocrisy stand in the way of our efforts to make health care more affordable for American families.

Today the Senate rejected a Congressional Review Act resolution introduced by Senate Democrats that would make it harder for states to innovate & lower health care premium costs. https://t.co/hKm37SWHTu

Incredible work by #USSpecialForces intelligence community & @realDonaldTrump in executing mission to eliminate one of the most dangerous terrorist leaders in the world #ISIS leader Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi. Thanks to their brave actions America & the world is a safer place today.
